about_the_game:
The DLC adds a new gameplay mode where players take control over a premade strike group and have to use all of the available resources to their maximum potential in order to complete new historically-inspired mission.

A stealth mission with escape. Year 1943.
The Allies are looking for a way to identify weak points of the new Japanese superweapon - Yamato. Your goal is to stay hidden and repeatedly send scouts as the iconic battleship is attacked by the submarines. Your pilots are instructed to report on possible damages and torpedo resistance of the ship.
detailed_description:
The DLC adds a new gameplay mode where players take control over a premade strike group and have to use all of the available resources to their maximum potential in order to complete new historically-inspired mission.

A stealth mission with escape. Year 1943.
The Allies are looking for a way to identify weak points of the new Japanese superweapon - Yamato. Your goal is to stay hidden and repeatedly send scouts as the iconic battleship is attacked by the submarines. Your pilots are instructed to report on possible damages and torpedo resistance of the ship.
name: Aircraft Carrier Survival: End of Harmony (Mission 2)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows 7,8 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Ti / Intel HD 620
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K / AMD FX-8320 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 / Radeon R9 290X
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: A brand new mission and a new ship for campaign mode await you in this add-on.
